metadata.title: CVE-2011-1459 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The WebKit::WebPluginContainerImpl::handleEvent function in Google Chromebefore Blink M11 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service (crash)via the htmlpluginelement.cpp plugin.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
